content:
[{"id":"r9TBisLQea","type":"card","data":{"card_name":"One-time tasks","col":5}},{"id":"txUuE2ZJwK","type":"card","data":{"card_name":"Ongoing tasks","col":4}},{"id":"565SdPbMiN","type":"header","data":{"text":"Usage","col":12}},{"id":"BBag-QLdDV","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"1. Setup a learning space (example: a school)
2. Create at least one learning cohort associated with the learning space
3. Upload learners for each cohort
4. Create activities
5. Create entries for teachers (all the teachers who are likely to use ELA in the learning space)
6. Create assessment forms - one each for a cohort + activity
7. Export the assessment form as a file. This 'form file' will be used by the ELA Collect mobile app.
8. Transfer it to the phone device via Bluetooth (link to steps - TBC)
9.  Ensure the form file is in the location Dowload/ela/forms
10. Open the ELA Collect app (scan QR code step - TBC)
11. Click on 'Download Form'. This will load your form from the location Download/ela/form into the app
12. Click on 'Start new form' and submit forms as usual.","col":12}},{"id":"OJ9kE1HHGO","type":"header","data":{"text":"Prerequisites","col":12}},{"id":"HPBWP55naS","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"1. A smartphone with the following installed and/or enabled:
- ELA Collect app
- KDE Connect
- Bluetooth enabled
2. A desktop computer with the following installed:
- ELA AI software. Collect the user id and password from the administrator
- KDE Connect
3. Understand key terminology - Cohort, Learner, Activity, Assessment Form, Submission, Package
4. Understand the software flow","col":12}}]
label: ELA Home

links.description: Manage learners, teachers, activities and assessments.
links.label: One-time tasks
Upload a package from ELA Collect

name: ELA Home
